sentence: In  total,  Hamas  fighters  and  other  militants  killed  about  1,200  people  and  abducted  more  than  240  on  Oct.  7,  Israeli  officials  say.

In  addition  to  the  time  in  captivity,  the  experience  on  Oct.  7  was  a  major  trauma  for  the  hostages  â€”  their  kibbutzim  rampaged,  their  homes  invaded,  neighbors  killed  and  kidnapped.

"I  think  that  we  will  only  learn  as  the  days  go  on  and  for  a  long  time,  what  really  effectively  will  be  the  results  of  having  been  a  hostage  and  having  been  in  her  father's  arms  when  he  was  murdered,"  said  Liz  Hirsh  Naftali,  Edan's  great-aunt,  in  an  interview  with  NPR.
Hamas  also  holds  the  remains  of  about  20  dead,  Israeli  officials  now  say,  though  it  is  unclear  if  they  died  on  Oct.  7  or  in  captivity.
Hamas  also  holds  the  remains  of  about  20  dead,  Israeli  officials  now  say,  though  it  is  unclear  if  they  died  on  Oct.  7  or  in  captivity.
Hamas  has  said  that  Israeli  airstrikes  have  killed  some  hostages.
Health  officials  say  a  majority  of  the  dead  are  women  and  children.  )
